title: Project Management in Practice - From Principles and Concepts to Project Kick-Off
headline: Learn the basics of project management and enhance your project management skills with this free online course.
description: This free online project management principles course covers the project management process from principles and concepts to project kick-off. You'll study the basic concepts of technical project management, Lean and Agile software development, project selection procedures, project initiation, procurement and supply chain management, and project leadership and teams. Take this course today and learn project management from the ground up.
courseDescription:
Improve your project management skills by studying the free online course Project Management in Practice - From Principles and Concepts to Project Kick-Off. This course covers the basic principles and practices essential in effective technical project management. The course begins with an overview of the concepts in technical project management in the living order and in the geometric order.

Next, the course provides a basic introduction to Lean and Agile software development in relation to technical project management. The course then describes the various processes involved in project management such as project selection, initiation, procurement, supply chain management, and project leadership in teams. You will also learn about the strategies to adopt for effective project execution and portfolio management in the context of technical project management.

This course is aimed at meeting the interests and needs of mid-career professionals who value practical principles and guidance, as well as learners who wish to build on previous project management experience and learn about effective strategies for managing complex technical projects. This includes an emphasis on applying concepts within project management to real-world issues. So, why wait? Improve your project management skills by starting the course today!

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital : a downloadable in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • : a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked , posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed : a physical version of your officially branded and security marked in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.

All are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison , please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison , you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard.
